text: Bad Timing is a 1980 British psychological drama movie directed by Nicolas Roeg. It stars Harvey Keitel, Art Garfunkel, Theresa Russell, Denholm Elliott and Daniel Massey. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1980 drama movies Category:1980s psychological movies Category:1980s erotic movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies directed by Nicolas Roeg Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in Vienna Category:Movies about stalking
title: Bad Timing
